description:
The student council president. She is the grandchild of the director of the school and always wears a bright smile. Her appearance and demeanour match her current position as the prince charming of Myoudou Gakuen bringing her many female fans amongst the student body.
Because of her older brother`s poor health she has to take up the duty as the family`s next head and master of the dojo, causing her to dress and act as a boy rather than a girl, but in reality she likes cute things and would like to dress like a girl. Because of those feelings she becomes a target for Koburaaja and is turned into a Dezatorian in episode 7.
name: Myoudouin Itsuki
